text: UFP is an abbreviation that has several meanings: * Ultrafine particle, a particulate matter of nanoscale size (less than 100 nanometres in diameter) * Union des forces progressistes, a former Canadian left-wing political party of Quebec * Union of Forces of Progress, a former political party in Benin * Union of the Forces of Progress (Union des Forces du Progr√®s), a political party in Mauritania * United Federal Party, a former political party of Southern Rhodesia from 1934 to 1965 * United Federation of Planets, of the fictional Star Trek universe. * University Foundation Programme, a one-year intensive course that leads to entry to a wide range of universities in the United Kingdom * United Future Party, a South Korean conservative political party.
title: UFP
